name: Sensible Blood Rugby
description:
An hommage to classic arcade game from the 90s, adapted to the olympic sports of rugby sevens !

Experience Tackles, Rucks , Illegal Tackles Make your way to the score lines and score many tries!

-Up to 4 players -16 Teams -International competitions ( 1/4 + 1/2 + final)

The rules are the rules of rugby sevens.
